description: Detection well-known mimikatz command line arguments Author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov, oscd.community, David ANDRE (additional keywords), Tim Shelton. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Legitimate Administrator using tool for password recovery
name: Mimikatz Command Line
query: (((process.command_line:(*DumpCreds* OR *invoke\-mimikatz*) OR (process.command_line:(*rpc* OR *token* OR *crypto* OR *dpapi* OR *sekurlsa* OR *kerberos* OR *lsadump* OR *privilege* OR *process* OR *vault*) AND process.command_line:*\:\:*)) OR (process.command_line:(*aadcookie* OR *detours* OR *memssp* OR *mflt* OR *ncroutemon* OR *ngcsign* OR *printnightmare* OR *skeleton* OR *preshutdown* OR *mstsc* OR *multirdp*) AND process.command_line:*\:\:*)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line:*function\ Convert\-GuidToCompressedGuid*))))
